trends: There has been one other sighting in Flin Flon
There were no other sightings in Flin Flon on or around August 15th 2002
divs: Sighting DetailsIn 1982 I woke from shiftwork and went down to thelake to wade and pick rocks and stones from the lakebottom to assist my brotherbuilding a breakwater along the shore. My b My brother was w2eary and lay downasleep. The night before I had seen someone at work and was very angry as Ithought about it that day. I continued to dig in the lakebottom when I noticeda black strobe-like effect coming through the top of my head. I looked up towhere it was and there in a tree was a ball of moving sine-waves of Light. Iwas astounded at this novel thing with the flowing sine
Summary: telepathaic close encounter of fifth kind with bal
